import logging

from .utils import AlmostUUID


DEFAULT_LOGGING_LEVEL = logging.INFO



[docs]def config_logging(verbosity: int) -> None:
    uid = AlmostUUID()
    level = DEFAULT_LOGGING_LEVEL
    if verbosity:
        level = logging.DEBUG
    logging.basicConfig(
        level=level,
        format=f"[%(asctime)-15s][{uid}][%(levelname)s] %(message)s"
    )
